Introduction

Jinhwa is a South Korean rapper under Wuzo Entertainment. He is a leader of the boy group BLITZERS.

Jinhwa entered the Mnet reality survival series Produce X 101 in 2019 as a representative of his firm. After placing 74th, he was eliminated on the fifth episode.

He was revealed as a member of Wuzo's new boy group, WUZOCIRCLE (now known as BLITZERS), on March 17, 2020.

He was reintroduced as BLITZERS' third member on February 5, 2021. On May 12, 2021, he made his group debut with their first EP 'Check-In'.
